changes: [merge] Fix crash when creating a new slot with resource overrides (thanks miyehn)
[merge] Add level sync option (thanks Turtle)
[merge] Add image export feature
[merge] Remove "Extended buff duration" config option
Fix fast Rainbow Drip recast time being calculated incorrectly (thanks Wan Shott)
Add Smudge, Tempera Coat, and Tempera Grassa
Correct precision of GCD formula (should not break existing timelines)
[merge] Account for FPS alignment
Updated CDH potency modifier calculations (thanks Turtle)
Fix Madeen not displaying (thank you yuyuyuyuka)
Add extended buffs for Aetherhues and Starry Muse (thanks also yuyuyuyuka)
[merge] Allow party buffs to last shorter than max duration
Allow Inspiration to be toggled like Ley Lines (thanks turtle)
Prevent Aetherhues, Subtractive Palette, and Hammer Time from being clicked off
Fix tooltip-displayed application delays for Holy in White, Comet in Black, and Hammers (thanks one more time yuyuyuyuka)
[merge] Update tincture application delay and add back TOP/DSR tracks
Fix warning text rendering for comet + palette gauge (thanks sterling)
Initial fork! Below bugfixes are caught between first deployment and public announcements.
Incorporate Turtle's auto CDH code
Fix hammer only having 1 stack (thanks Turtle)
Require being in combat to cast striking/starry
Display comet in gauge and clean up gauge display
Fix Hammer Time buff persisting after all hammers (thanks again Turtle)
Change default config to match patch 7.05 2.5 gcd bis
